module: Module-level comment: The RAM_speech_94 module implements a single-port RAM designed for speech data storage on a Cyclone IV GX FPGA. Utilizing the `altsyncram` Altera component, it supports synchronized read and write operations via control signals (rden, wren) based on the `address`. Data flow is managed with internal wiring (`sub_wire0`) directly connecting the component’s output to the module’s output port `q`.
